<<<<<<< HEAD
A vision in the Tower to the L. H. in his contemplation.
1 sheet ([2] p.)
printed by T.N., [London : 1681].
Verse - "And is it so? Or am I in a dream?". L. H. = William Howard, Baron Howard of Escrick. Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
